message: Let's start with a fair offer. This gives us both a good share.
Your share decreases with each round due to inflation. I'm offering a bit over half to make it worthwhile for both of us to close the deal now.
Bob, I understand the inflation pressure, but your offer was too low. This is a more balanced proposal.
Alice, the clock is ticking and your position is only getting worse with the inflation.  I'm meeting you closer to the middle this time, let's be reasonable and end this.
Bob, I'm aiming for a fair deal.  This offer reflects the time pressure but also recognizes that we both lose if this drags on.
Alice, this is getting ridiculous. Accept this offer - it's almost an even split -  or I'm playing hardball from here on out.  Don't let inflation force you to take a worse deal later.
Bob, let's stop wasting time. A 50/50 split is the fairest and quickest way to end this. Take it or leave it.
